bioconda.name: bioconductor-probamr
bioconda.summary: Generating SAM file for PSMs in shotgun proteomics data

biotools.summary: Mapping PSMs back to genome. The package builds SAM file from shotgun proteomics data The package also provides function to prepare annotation from GTF file.

bioschemas.name: proBAMr
bioschemas.summary: Mapping PSMs back to genome. The package builds SAM file from shotgun proteomics data The package also provides function to prepare annotation from GTF file.
